text: Hou Zongbin (; January 1929 â€“ 14 November 2017) was a Chinese politician. He served as Governor of Shaanxi Province from 1987 to 1990, as Communist Party Secretary of Henan Province from 1990 to 1992, and as Deputy Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection from 1992 to 1998. Hou died on 14 November 2017 in Beijing of a heart attack at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Chinese communist politicians Category:People from Hebei Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Hou Zongbin
